section.title: com.thealgorithms.conversions.AnyBaseToAnyBase Class Reference

listitem.para: static boolean validForBase (String n, int base)
static String base2base (String n, int b1, int b2)

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Class for converting from "any" base to "any" other base, when "any" means from 2-36. Works by going from base 1 to decimal to base 2. Includes auxiliary method for determining whether a number is valid for a given base.

section.section:

static String com.thealgorithms.conversions.AnyBaseToAnyBase.base2base (String n, int b1, int b2)[static]
Method to convert any integer from base b1 to base b2. Works by converting from b1 to decimal, then decimal to b2.
Parameters
n
The integer to be converted.
b1
Beginning base.
b2
End base.
Returns
n in base b2.

Checks if a number (as a String) is valid for a given base.
